attributes.action: remove the 'Barnett Formula'  that is known to be unfaire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Remove the 'Barnett Formula' and replace with a system that is fairer to all. The Barnett Formula was a short term formula for payment per head in the UK, not for the lenght of time it now has been in place. It is recognised as unfaire benifiting a few at the expense of the majority.
